definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]

sentences.english: Inscribed with a dozen or more function scales, the slide rule symbolized the mysteries of arcane science.
sentences.chinese: 计算尺上刻著十几种函数刻度，宛如科学奥秘的化身。

sentences.english: Our Super-Secret Spy Lens is the answer.
sentences.chinese: 这就是这个镜头的奥秘之处了。

sentences.english: X-ray photography used to fathom such mysteries as honeybee navigation.
sentences.chinese: 用来探测像蜜蜂飞行导向这类奥秘的x光照相术。

sentences.english: The secret, Palumbi said, may be that the high temperatures last for a short period of time.
sentences.chinese: 帕卢比说，奥秘可能在于高温只持续了很短一段时间。

sentences.english: I may have all knowledge and understand all secrets.
sentences.chinese: 我可以知晓天下事，发现大自然所有的奥秘。

sentences.english: That was part of the secret of the gay genius.
sentences.chinese: 这就是这位旷古奇才乐天派的奥秘的一面。

sentences.english: the secret was spread among the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 奥秘在人群傍边流传开来。

sentences.english: They met at one of the Bouchercon mystery conferences.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一届柏琼奥秘大会上遇见对方。

sentences.english: The language with humorous is one of the seasons that the story attains success.
sentences.chinese: 幽默诙谐的语言是阿凡提故事成功的奥秘之一。

sentences.english: The mage gains one point of armor per dot she possesses in the Time Arcanum .
sentences.chinese: 法师每具有一点时间奥秘，就获得一点护甲。

sentences.english: The work is symbolic in many ways as the viewer is always looking towards the light contemplating the mystery of the eternal.
sentences.chinese: 作品运用多种象征手段让观众深切体会到永恒的奥秘。

sentences.english: The mysteries of faith are hidden from sense and reason.
sentences.chinese: 信仰的奥秘是感觉和理性所不能察知的。

sentences.english: What mysteries do you know about the nine planets in the solar system?
sentences.chinese: 关于太阳系里的九大行星，你知道哪些奥秘？

sentences.english: This divine name is mysterious just as God is mystery.
sentences.chinese: 这个神圣的名字是奥秘的，正如天主是奥迹的一样。

sentences.english: Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience.
sentences.chinese: 要存清洁的良心，固守真道的奥秘。

sentences.english: Julia Pan teaches her 3nd class of "Unlocking the Meaning of Life".
sentences.chinese: 潘悦纳讲授“打开人生奥秘之门”的第三课。

definition: profound theory (in Daoism and Buddhism)/mysterious principles
to investigate/to delve/to probe/to enquire into/to look into
abstruse/profound mystery/the mysteries of the universe
to comprehend (the nature of things etc)/to achieve enlightenment
